text: Mammillaria anniana is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Tamaulipas state of northeastern Mexico. Its natural habitat is hot deserts. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== anniana Category:Cacti of Mexico Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Tamaulipas Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mammillaria anniana
